Type.Name: ResolveEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Reflection.Assembly ResolveEventHandler(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.param: The arguments to the resolution callback.
Docs.summary: Signature for various events emitted by the .
Docs.value: The assembly that this event resolved to.
